name: Star Leader
description:
Star Leader is, as you probably know, a real-time strategy game, more commonly known as STR (or RTS). You will be the undisputed leader of your own empire, and you will aim to conquer the galaxies around you. However, be careful because you will not be alone in wanting to satisfy your expansionist desires and you will face formidable enemy empires. You will therefore have to grow your empire, while being careful not to abandon the planets furthest away from your troops, which could fan the lusts of your enemies.

You can check our website here : https://rihata.github.io/Star-Leader/index.html

Thanks for all
